name: Inverted Cross Cushion
description:
If you want a devilish accessory, then this is perfect. These have also been a personal gift to Sean Smith of The Blackout and can be viewed on his Instagram (fakeseansmith) or tumblr (imakedirtylove.tumblr.com) Size guide (Approx)
  • Small - 5 inches x 5 inches
  • Medium - 10 inches x 10 inches
Please select the correct colour and size when ordering. Example: "Small - black/red" will be a small black cushion with a red cross. Once your payment has cleared I will make and deliver your cushion as soon as possible. These are all handmade, so they take a few hours to make and might take a few weeks to make and send to you. Please be patient but don't hesitate to contact me if you want to track progress. Email me at spunkystitching@hotmail.co.uk or use the contact form if you have any queries.
